QuestData.Title: A New Master
QuestData.Description: The potion you created is vile enough to wake the dead. Which is its intended purpose.$B$BSlay a Twilight Inferno Lord and force the brew down his throat. He will revive, if only briefly, and be completely under your dominance.$B$BSpeak with him and learn the true name of the fire elemental he is channeling into the world to burn down your precious forest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Bottled Bileberry Brew on the corpse of a Twilight Inferno Lord, then speak with him.
QuestData.RewardText: <The wretched creature before you speaks in a wavering voice, its body broken but briefly animated by Blackhorn's vile potion.>$B$BYes, master?
